column4: I have an Asus 1015PN that I can allegedly tell to run graphics on Intel or Nvidia.  How do I confirm which one is active?
one of those DUal Video Card laptops? IVe heard they can well.. be probleatic in Linux. :(
- People have figured stuff out on them, but I haven't poked Ubuntu in years so I'm not sure I did it correctly
You could try running the nvidia-settings tool and see what it says
